## Introduction

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="60%"}

Burns Bog is a unique raised bog located in Delta, BC.  The **BBECA** was established in 2005

* Prevent further development
* Remediate impacts of harvesting
  * Preserve the peatland ecosystem
  * Prevent/reverse Carbon loss

:::
